column4: Hi. I don't have a CDROM still wants to install Ubuntu. What's the most easy way to do this? I have a computer (LAN) and USB flash drive. I have tried to use the guide at help.ubuntu.com to install via USB stick, but the USB stick don't boot up
you may need to configure the bios
I have made it bootable with UNetbootin like the guide said
i have had some usb devices work after prep with netbootin and some dont,
